install.description: Choose between map mode or input mode for users to get directions to your site. Visit us at: www.shape5.com

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: s5mapitver
param.label: Choose which version you want to display
param.description: Choosing version 2 will show a map, version 1 will show address input boxes with a map it buttons so users can then

param.name: s5miwidth
param.label: Map Width
param.description: Enter the map width in pixels you desire

param.name: s5miheight
param.label: Map Height
param.description: Enter the map height in pixels you desire

param.name: zoomlev
param.label: Zoom Level
param.description: Enter a number for the default zoom level

param.name: s5mapcontrol
param.label: Enable Map Controls?
param.description: Choosing to enable or disable the map controls

param.name: getdirections
param.label: Text for get directions link
param.description: Enter the text you'd like to show in for the get directions link
